page.title: 06ENERGY-INCLUDE MAIN SERVICES
page.content: {OIL}-THERE IS EVIDENCE OF OIL IN THE GREENSAND ON REIGATE HEATH. {ELECTRICITY}-ALL THE HOUSES,FARMS AND BUSINESSES USE 240v EITHER 1/3 PHASE. SUPPLY IS 33kv-11kv-50c/s240v.BOTH OVERHEAD AND UNDERGROUND DISTRIBUTION ARE USED,THIS AREA FOUGHT OFF PYLONS! {GAS}-30miles OF PIPELINE FROM BURYS COURT TO BETCHWORTH INCL REIGATE HEATH AND BROCKHAM PARK. SNOWERHILL AREA HAS NO MAINS GAS. {WATER}-HAS COME SLOWLY INTO AREA WELLS AND SPRINGS WERE IN USE AS LATE AS THE 1950s.BURYS COURT HAD DONKEY POWERED WELL! IN EARLY 1960s IT BECAME CLEAR THAT MORE MAINS WATER WAS REQUIRED AND IN 1971 NEW SUPPLIES WERE INTRODUCED BY BOUGH BEECH SCHEME. {SEWAGE}-MAIN SEWAGE IS ONLY COMMON AT THE WEST SIDE OF THE AREA ELSEWHERE THERE ARE MANY PRIVATE SYSTEMS IN USE. {REFUSE}-COLLECTED ONCE A WEEK IN BULK.
